name: MQTT Trigger
natural_language_description: 这是 MQTT Trigger 节点。主要用于: Listens to MQTT events

topics.name: topics
topics.description: Topics to subscribe to, multiple can be defined with comma. Wildcard characters are supported (+ - for single level and # - for multi level). By default all subscription used QoS=0. To set a different QoS, write the QoS desired after the topic preceded by a colom. For Example: topicA:1,topicB:2
topics.natural_language_description: 参数名: Topics | 作用: Topics to subscribe to, multiple can be defined with comma. Wildcard characters are supported (+ - for single level and # - for multi level). By default all subscription used QoS=0. To set a different QoS, write the QoS desired after the topic preceded by a colom. For Example: topicA:1,topicB:2

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: jsonParseBody (值: None) - Whether to try parse the message to an object
onlyMessage (值: None) - Whether to return only the message property
parallelProcessing (值: None) - Whether to process messages in parallel or by keeping the message in order
